Label: Cigarettes smoked in entire life
Comment: The following questions are about cigarette smoking and other tobacco use.  Do not include cigars or marijuana.  About how many cigarettes have you smoked in your entire life?
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Age first smoked whole cigarette
Comment: How old were you when you smoked a whole cigarette for the first time?
Note: IF R SAYS LESS THAN 6 YEARS, ENTER 6 YEARS. VERBAL INSTRUCTIONS TO SP: Please enter an age. CAPI INSTRUCTION: ACCEPTABLE VALUES: 6-17 YEARS. ENTER AGE.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Brand of cigarettes smoked past 30 days
Comment: During the past 30 days, on the days that you smoked, which brand of cigarettes did you usually smoke?
Note: INSTRUCTIONS TO SP: Please select one of the following choices
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Marlboro variety
Comment: Please select the Marlboro pack that looks most like the brand that you smoke. If the pack you smoke is not shown, select 'other Marlboro.'
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTIONS:  SHOW IMAGES OF MARLBORO RED, MARLBORO RED 83S, MARLBORO GOLD, MARLBORO GOLD MENTHOL, MARLBORO SILVER, MARLBORO BLACK, MARLBORO MENTHOL AND OTHER MARLBORO.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Camel variety
Comment: Please select the Camel pack that looks most like the brand that you smoke. If the pack you smoke is not shown, select 'other Camel.'
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTIONS:  SHOW IMAGES OF CAMEL, CAMEL BLUE, CAMEL CRUSH, CAMEL CRUSH BOLD, CAMEL MENTHOL, CAMEL MENTHOL SILVER, AND OTHER CAMEL.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Newport variety
Comment: Please select the Newport pack that looks most like the brand that you smoke. If the pack you smoke is not shown, select 'other Newport.'
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTIONS:  SHOW IMAGES OF NEWPORT, NEWPORT MENTHOL GOLD, AND OTHER NEWPORT.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Other brand
Comment: Please select the pack that looks most like the brand that you smoke. If the pack you smoke is not shown, select 'other brand of cigarette.'
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTIONS:  SHOW IMAGES OF BASIC FF, DORAL RED 100S, DORAL MENTHOL GOLD BOX 100S, GPC FF, GPC FF MENTHOL, KOOL BLUE MENTHOL 100S, KOOL TRUE MENTHOL, VIRGINIA SLIMS FF, AND OTHER BRAND.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 17 YEARS

Label: Tried to quit smoking
Comment: During the past 12 months, have you stopped smoking for one day or longer because you were trying to quit smoking?
Note: VERBAL INSTRUCTIONS TO SP:  Please select Yes, No.
Target: Both males and females 12 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: # times stopped smoking cigarettes
Comment: During the past 12 months, how many times {have you/has SP} stopped smoking cigarettes because {you were/he was/she was} trying to quit smoking?
Note: ENTER NUMBER OF TIMES (1-20 TIMES)CAPI INSTRUCTION: IF MORE THAN 20 TIMES ENTER 20
Target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: How long were you able to stop smoking
Comment: The last time {you/SP} tried to quit, how long {were you/was he/was she} able to stop smoking?
Note: CAPI INSTRUCTION: SOFT EDIT: SMQ852 CANNOT BE GREATER THAN 364 DAYS, 11 MONTHS OR 51 WEEKS.ENTER NUMBER (OF DAYS, WEEKS OR MONTHS)
Target: Both males and females 18 YEARS - 150 YEARS

Label: Unit of measure (day/week/month/year)
Comment: The last time {you/SP} tried to quit, how long {were you/was he/was she} able to stop smoking?
